original_title: Harun, who only drinks beer, has a glass of wine (2011).
overview: A short film made by D. N. Rodowick about the director Harun Farocki drinking a glass of wine in summer, 2011 in Berlin.
tagline: Harun, who only drinks beer, has a glass of wine.
title: Harun, who only drinks beer, has a glass of wine (2011).
